tool_description: Monitors acne severity, types, and patterns to assess breakout conditions and treatment needs.

active_lesions.description: Current number of active acne lesions (0-50)

breakout_frequency.description: How often new breakouts occur: daily, weekly, monthly, rarely

hormonal_correlation.description: Whether breakouts correlate with menstrual cycle

error_messages: Invalid lesion count: active_lesions must be integer between 0-50.
Invalid lesion types: lesion_types array can contain 0-8 string items.
Invalid affected areas: affected_areas array can contain 0-10 string items.
Invalid breakout frequency: Must be one of [daily, weekly, monthly, rarely].
Invalid treatment list: current_treatments array can contain maximum 10 string items.
Inconsistent acne data: High lesion count should correlate with frequent breakouts.
usage: Count all visible acne lesions including whiteheads, blackheads, papules, pustules, nodules, and cysts. Document all affected facial areas and note any patterns related to hormonal cycles.

dominant_lesion_type.description: Most common type of acne lesion
